name: AweSOME Math
description:
Awesome Math!

Try your math skills!

Controls

Up and Down arrows to change X value a lot

Left and Right arrows to change X value a bit

Z to skip the question

X to submit your answer

Known Issues
  • Counting points now is a feature but maybe it will be considered as a bug
  • Sound will be added in later versions.
Disclaimer

This is my first project made with PICO-8.
